settings.name: site_title
settings.label: Site title
settings.help: Use #page# where page title etc has to appear

settings.name: modules
settings.label: Modules
settings.help: [modules]||Which modules and in what order to load from modules installed to the server||{cms} is always automatically loaded as the first

settings.name: landing_page
settings.label: Default landing page
settings.help: Page to land when empty slug (host domain name only)

settings.name: inline_limit
settings.label: Css inlining limit
settings.help: [css inlining limit]||Google likes when first pageful is inside first 14kB||Approximate amount of css to inline. Use lower numbers for fine tuning and higher for sanity checks||Must have {inline_css} be set and {pack_css} not set in config file

settings.name: targets_enabled
settings.label: Visitor target groups
settings.help: Enable visitor target groups for languages, AB testing, logged in panels etc

settings.name: cron_trigger
settings.label: Repeating tasks trigger
settings.help: [visits] - need to run regularly repeating tasks is checked when users visit||[cron] - when server crontab calls /cms_operations/cron/ (preferred, but not always available)

settings.name: not_found_log
settings.label: Not found log
settings.help: File to log not found requests data. Under cache folder.

settings.name: allow_ajax_panels
settings.label: Ajax access to any panel
settings.help: Enable ajax loading any panel. Usually not secure

settings.name: salt
settings.label: Salt
settings.help: Salt for hash functions. Do not change when you don't know about this.

settings.name: allow_api_anywhere
settings.label: Allow API anywhere
settings.help: Enable API from anywhere. Adds Access-Control-Allow-Origin header to API requests

settings.name: language
settings.label: Site default language
settings.help: Default language for the site

settings.label: Layout
settings.help: Settings related to site layout

settings.name: position_wrappers
settings.label: Position wrappers
settings.help: {Position wrappers} to be added to layout positions. Eg div named [cms_position_main] around main position.

settings.name: position_links
settings.label: Position links
settings.help: {Position links} - when position wrappers are enabled, in site links will load page positions

settings.name: mobile_zoom
settings.label: Mobile zoom
settings.help: {Mobile zoom} enables pinch zoom for {rem} layout on mobile devices. [Disabled] is ignored by iOS.

settings.label: Sizing
settings.help: Settings related content size on screen

settings.name: rem_px
settings.label: Rem max width px
settings.help: {Default rems} layout max 100 rems width.||Leave empty when not set

settings.name: rem_ratio
settings.label: Rem max ratio**
settings.help: {Default rems} layout max 100 rems ratio to viewport height.||Leave empty when not set||**(will be removed)

settings.name: rem_m_px
settings.label: Rem mobile px
settings.help: {Default rems} layout breakpoint for mobile size. Rems are twice as big below this viewport width.||Leave empty when not set

settings.name: rem_switched
settings.label: Desktop rem switched
settings.help: {Rem switched} on desktop sizes use width or height for rem calculation

settings.name: rem_k
settings.label: Rem divider
settings.help: {Rem divider} height of 1 rem to viewport size

settings.name: rem_m_k
settings.label: Rem mobile divider
settings.help: {Rem mobile divider} height of 1 rem to mobile viewport size

settings.label: Image optimisation
settings.help: Settings related to image optimisation

settings.name: images_quality
settings.label: Image packing quality
settings.help: [Image packing quality]||When jpgs are resized or pngs compressed, they are saved in this quality.||If you want to make {Google Page Insights} happy, set it to 85||Otherwise, when there is no problems with page speed, set this to 95.||Webp uses this - 5

settings.name: images_1x
settings.label: Image 1x desktop modifier
settings.help: [Image 1x desktop modifier]||Modifier to template suggested image size for natural pixel size screens

settings.name: images_2x
settings.label: Image 2x desktop modifier
settings.help: [Image 2x desktop modifier]||Modifier to template suggested image size for high density (retina) screens

settings.name: images_textarea
settings.label: Image in textarea size
settings.help: [Image in textarea size]||Images in textareas width to max width pixels||If result is zero or over 1000px, 1000px is used

settings.name: images_mobile
settings.label: Image mobile modifier
settings.help: [Image mobile modifier]||Modifier to template suggested image size for mobile devices

settings.label: Metadata and SEO
settings.help: Settings related to sharing and search engine metadata

settings.name: meta_image
settings.label: Image
settings.help: Imge to use when page or list item doesn't have meta image defined

settings.label: CMS interface
settings.help: Settings related to CMS look

settings.label: Email
settings.help: Settings related to CMS system email

settings.name: email
settings.label: From email
settings.help: Do not change, as may go to spam
Email to send notifications from||If empty, defaults to domain@narrativecms.com

settings.name: admin_email
settings.label: Technical admin email
settings.help: Email to send technical system messages. Eg error logs.

settings.name: smtp_server
settings.label: SMTP server
settings.help: If empty, php mail is used

settings.name: smtp_port
settings.label: SMTP port
settings.help: 25 for normal, 587 for authenticated SMTP

settings.name: smtp_debug
settings.label: SMTP debug
settings.help: Saves SMTP debug log to cache folder
